attributes.action: Make all physically able people on benefits get out there and clear the streets and roads of snow before receiving their money.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I do not see why there are so many people on benifits who could be using a shovel so the lucky few with jobs who support them can get to work and pay their benifits. We don't have to grind to a halt! In summer why don't we see more litter pickers on our dirty streets come to think of it!
